page.title: 06Braydon Community Comparison
page.content: It may be of interest to compare this area with that of the nearby Swindon expansion area. If this survey had been written 10 years ago the communities to the South-West of Purton would have been very similar to those of Braydon & Greenhill. Because of the rapid expansion planned and developed through Thamesdown Council. Now, the two areas are completely different. The area around Shaw is now highly developed with a new network of roads, housing and a community building. The area around Braydon & Greenhill has been left untouched by developers. At the present time the are no plans for any substantial housing or industial developments. So for the present time these are communities in contrast. In the 21st Century - who knows ?
